response.overview: Scandinavian directing trio Luvvbites joins the XConfessions series for their first Guest Directed film, the inimitable and unforgettable Frostbite. Featuring two first-time Finnish performers, Luvvbites skillfully take us inside the lustful imagination of a woman in a sauna. A vital part of Finnish culture, the steam room and it's nudity are taken from their usual casual enjoyment to new heights of pleasure, as the heat of passion envelops a woman and pulls us into her erotic fantasy.
response.title: Frostbite
